open-date.description: The date and time when the listing was opened

item-is-marketplace.description: Indicates if the item is listed on the marketplace

item-note.description: Additional notes related to the item

zshop-category1.description: Category of the item on Zshop

asin1.description: Unique identifier for the first ASIN

asin2.description: Unique identifier for the second ASIN

asin3.description: Unique identifier for the third ASIN

will-ship-internationally.description: Indicates if the item will ship internationally

expedited-shipping.description: Indicates if expedited shipping is available

zshop-boldface.description: Indicates if the item is displayed in boldface

add-delete.description: Indicates if an item should be added or deleted

Business Price.description: The price of the item for business customers

Quantity Price Type.description: The type of pricing for quantity pricing tiers

Quantity Lower Bound 1.description: The lower boundary for the first quantity pricing tier

Quantity Price 1.description: The price associated with the first quantity pricing tier

Quantity Lower Bound 2.description: The lower boundary for the second quantity pricing tier

Quantity Price 2.description: The price associated with the second quantity pricing tier

Quantity Lower Bound 3.description: The lower boundary for the third quantity pricing tier

Quantity Price 3.description: The price associated with the third quantity pricing tier

Quantity Lower Bound 4.description: The lower boundary for the fourth quantity pricing tier

Quantity Price 4.description: The price associated with the fourth quantity pricing tier

Quantity Lower Bound 5.description: The lower boundary for the fifth quantity pricing tier

Quantity Price 5.description: The price associated with the fifth quantity pricing tier

Progressive Price Type.description: The type of pricing for progressive pricing tiers

Progressive Lower Bound 1.description: The lower boundary for a progressive pricing tier

Progressive Price 1.description: The price associated with the first progressive pricing tier

Progressive Lower Bound 2.description: The second lower boundary for a progressive pricing tier

Progressive Price 2.description: The price associated with the second progressive pricing tier

Progressive Lower Bound 3.description: The third lower boundary for a progressive pricing tier

Progressive Price 3.description: The price associated with the third progressive pricing tier

dataEndTime.description: The date when the data was last updated
